name: Mini Bike: Off Road Dirt Race
name_original: Mini Bike: Off Road Dirt Race
description:
Mini Bike Racing is a fast-paced racing game

It will test your nerves and take you to the extremes off road capabilities. This game will test your balance skills and reaction times beyond belief.

Features:
* Beautiful 3D Graphics
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Challenge tracks
* Vivid Animations And Physics
